TradingActivityLoss.description: The loss on trading activities (including both derivative and nonderivative instruments) recognized in the statement of financial performance.

TradingGainsLosses.label: Trading Gain (Loss)
TradingGainsLosses.description: Amount of gain (loss) resulting from the difference between the acquisition price and the selling price or fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities, conducted separately from customer trading activities. Includes, but is not limited to, changes in fair value of trading assets and trading liabilities.

TradingLiabilities.label: Trading Liabilities
TradingLiabilities.description: The carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date that pertain to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities, obligations under repurchase agreements, and securities borrowed arrangements.

TradingSecurities.label: Debt Securities, Trading, and Equity Securities, FV-NI
TradingSecurities.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading) and investment in equity security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (FV-NI).

TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.label: Transfer of Portfolio Loans and Leases to Held-for-sale
TransferOfPortfolioLoansAndLeasesToHeldF.description: Value of loans and leases held in the entity's portfolio transferred to loans and leases held-for-sale in noncash transactions.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums, Consumer (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Reflects the cumulative amount of fees paid by consumer borrowers which have not yet been taken into income and unamortized costs incurred to originate consumer loans and leases, unamortized consumer loan commitments and consumer loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of consumer loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Settlements with Taxing Authorities
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from settlements with taxing authorities.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets and Liabilities, Net (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The net carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's assets and liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.label: Variable Interest Entity, Consolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedCarryi.description: The carrying amount of the consolidated Variable Interest Entity's liabilities included in the reporting entity's statement of financial position.

VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.label: Variable Interest Entity, Reporting Entity Involvement, Maximum Loss Exposure, Amount
VariableInterestEntityEntityMaximumLossE.description: The reporting entity's maximum amount of exposure to loss as a result of its involvement with the Variable Interest Entity (VIE).

VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.description: Carrying amount of the assets in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.label: Variable Interest Entity, Nonconsolidated, Carrying Amount, Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
VariableInterestEntityNonconsolidatedCar.description: Carrying amount of the liabilities in the reporting entity's statement of financial position that relate to the reporting entity's variable interest in the Variable Interest Entity (VIE), where the reporting entity is not the VIE's primary beneficiary.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

DepositsDomestic.label: Deposits, Domestic
DepositsDomestic.description: The aggregate of all domestic interest-bearing and noninterest-bearing deposit liabilities.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Period Increase (Decrease)
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForSale.label: Financing Receivable, Transfer to Held-for-Sale, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense Reversal
FinancingReceivableTransferToHeldForSale.description: Amount of expense reversal of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable transferred to held-for-sale classification.

ServicingAsset.label: Servicing Asset
ServicingAsset.description: Aggregate amount of servicing assets that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing assets that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationGai.label: Disposal Group, Not Discontinued Operation, Gain (Loss) on Disposal
DisposalGroupNotDiscontinuedOperationGai.description: Amount before tax of gain (loss) recognized on the sale or disposal of a disposal group. Excludes discontinued operations.

FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Interest Income
FinancingReceivableNonaccrualInterestInc.description: Amount of interest income on financing receivable on nonaccrual status.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Loan Fee (Cost)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other fees (costs) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedPurchasePr.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Purchase Premium (Discount)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedPurchasePr.description: Amount of unamortized purchase premium (discount) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestBefore.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, before Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestBefore.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of accrued interest on financing receivable.

FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestWriteo.label: Financing Receivable, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAccruedInterestWriteo.description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on financing receivable recognized by reversing interest income.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.label: Gain (Loss) on Sales of Loans, Net
GainLossOnSalesOfLoansNet.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from a sale of loans, including adjustments to record loans classified as held-for-sale at the lower-of-cost-or-market and fair value adjustments to loan held for investment purposes.

OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherAssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other assets.

OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Other Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
OtherLiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of other liabilities.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.
